projects.project_name: Nateral gravel road rehabilitating Palhal village

ProjectSummary.Name: Nateral gravel road rehabilitating Palhal village
ProjectSummary.Objective: To comfortable of local people traveling

Outputs_Estimated_Cost.Description: Laterite road Upgrade [ 1010102 ]Dimension #1 : 4.000 Width (m)Dimension #2 : 862.000 Volume of earth (m3)

Evironmental_Safeguard.Impact: This project did not require environment study.
Evironmental_Safeguard.Reason: The project output is cover laterite on the old road only

Land_Safeguard.Impact: This project required land acquisition report.Voluntary
Land_Safeguard.Reason: Only small land area impacted, but all land users approved to voluntary contribution of land and assets to the project

Highland_Safeguard.Impact: This project did not require highland people report.
Highland_Safeguard.Reason: This project is outside of highland people living
